name: Crypt's Game
description: You are out in the woods, in search of the entity known as Crypt. Stopping in your tracks, you see it approaching. You take aim with your shotgun, intending to kill it, when suddenly the ground beneath you gives way, dropping you down into the earth. You find yourself trapped in Crypts dungeon where it will play a twisted game of Cat and Mouse. Killing it is the only way out, will you survive?

name: Star Life
description:
Sandbox "Zero To Hero" RPG in futuristic setting. Game features deep economic gameplay with realistic economy and full freedom for a player.

While on a planet, range of opportunities is wide, from being employed practically at any building (should there be a vacancy) to owning any non-government building, influencing economy directly. Entire planet economy is based on real buildings present in the game and therefore player can shape it to his liking (if player is rich enough). Player can also choose to be anyone - from local business owner, to criminal or politician (or as it might often be - all at once). Skill development is only possible if player performs tasks which require those skills.

Player can travel from planet to planet and own or rent any spaceship, mining, pirating or simply trading goods between planets. While game has no quests & restrictions, there is a main story present which implies that player need to achieve certain results and actions to meet win condition, which does not stop player from continuing game thereafter.

Choose any path or all at once. Model employee, Business owner, Politician, Merchant, Pirate, Criminal, or just explore game as it feels.

Engage in thrilling events, tackle challenging dungeons, and explore a meticulously crafted world brought to life by a professional development team. With flashy cosmetics, unique boosters, and a focus on community-driven updates, Oryum delivers a seamless blend of classic MMORPG nostalgia and modern enhancements.

Whether you're conquering epic bosses or building your legacy in the vibrant in-game economy, Oryum promises an unforgettable adventure tailored for veterans and newcomers alike. Join now and forge your story in a world that never stops evolving.

description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Portals
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Delta: Chaos Collision
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic EXP
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic the Hedgehog: Brutus
description: Sin descripción

name: Klonoa: The Dream Chapter
description: Sin descripción

name: Silver's Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Involution
description: Sin descripción

name: Mega Man World 4 DX
description:
A colorized remaster of Game Boy Mega Man IV that works on real GBC hardware.

Features:
- full color conversion
- slowdowns removed
- NES styled pause screen
- option to toggle charged megabuster recoil
- works in real GBC hardware and emulators

name: Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League - Season of Deathstroke
description: Season of Deathstroke of Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League delivers the final content updates for the game, bringing new features and enhancements. This season introduces Deathstroke as a playable character, alongside new melee weapons, Infamy sets, Notorious gear, and a fresh map called Elseworlds Mayhem. The season is divided into two episodes—Episode 7: Control and Episode 8: Balance—culminating in a battle against Brainiac.

name: Room and a Half
description:
Play a hilarious game full of surprises and challenges!

Will you be able to win the game of Room and a Half?
Help an extremely funny and unique set of characters - in a hilarious game that will surprise and challenge you all the way to the final stage....

name: Room and a Half 2
description: One Roach to rule them all

name: Stupid Ninjas
description:
From the makers of Stupid Zombies...

Stupid Ninjas have infested the land and you are the villagers last hope to restore order and sanity.

Use your Samurai sword wisely, you only have 1, 2 or 3 slashes to clear a level... fortunately, those Stupid Ninjas carry plenty of dangerous weapons to create chain reactions. Collect 3 shuriken in each level, and make sure to improve your time bonus once you figured out the correct sequence.

name: Oimostfonwy
description: oimostfonwy is an freeware game developed by the team ニシキガツオ (Nishikigatsuo), in which you play as seemingly an astronaut from outer space that landed in a city. There, you explore while finding different tunes to listen. There are notes explored around the world and seemly no plot or objective that the game directs the player.

name: The Finals: Season 4 - It's Showtime!
description:
Season 4 was the fourth season of THE FINALS. It launched on September 26, 2024, and ended on December 12, 2024. It was revealed on September 12, 2024, and previewed on September 20, 2024, at TwitchCon San Diego.

Season 4 puts particular focus on the sponsors of THE FINALS and the game show environment itself, with sponsors featured heavily in the season's arena and new progression paths.

This season was sponsored by HOLTOW, ENGIMO, and ISEUL-T, who introduced the all-new arena Fortune Stadium and the new sponsor career.

New content introduced in Season 4 includes:
- Arena: Fortune Stadium
- New cosmetics
- New Battle Pass
- Weapons: M26 Matter, Pike-556, .50 Akimbo
- Weapon sights
- Enhanced World Tour
- Progression: Sponsorships, new career levels

Season 4 reintroduced:
- Ranked Cashout tournaments

name: Rescue Team: Evil Genius - Collector's Edition
description:
Stop a mad scientist replicating the most destructive forces in nature! The Rescue Team has its hands full as it braves volcanoes, earthquakes, blizzards and more to save the people, animals and homes that lie in the path of utter devastation! Download Rescue Team: Evil Genius Collector's Edition today and join the greatest group of heroes to ever battle nature's fury!
- Captivating story and vibrant animated world
- Expert and casual modes
- Learn-as-you-play instructions

The Collector’s Edition includes 20 bonus levels, 40 achievements to earn, gold level pass guide, character biographies, FBI files, concept art and music!

name: Canvas
description: An exploration game with the core mechanic of painting the environment to alter the world. You must gain upgrades, abilities, and solve puzzles to eventually defeat the mad wizard that trapped you.

name: Straftat: Weapons, Maps and Hats
description:
The DLC "Weapons, Maps and Hats" contains :

- 70+ maps (totaling 140+ with the base game)

- 10 exclusive guns

- many new hats

Unlocked DLC content will be available for both players in owner's lobby.

Find the new guns on the DLC exclusive maps.

New cosmetic hats are unlocked immediately upon purchase.

name: Syntaxia
description: SYNTAXIA is a dream-dark adventure game that allows you to rewrite reality itself by changing the words that describe it. Use your creativity and intuition to escape. Which path will you choose?

name: Valor of Man
description:
Valor of Man is a roguelike tactical RPG where enemies react to your actions, giving you endless chances to outsmart them with your tactics.
Valor of Man is developed by Legacy Forge, small indie studio created by 2 brothers.

name: Puniru ha Kawaii Slime no Game wo "Ano Game" de Tsukuttemita Keredo, Hatashite Anata ha Clear Dekirunoka?
description: This game is a collection of three mini-games with 150 stages, created by D3 Publisher in collaboration with Dokokade Mita “Ano Ga ”me Tachi wo Bouningen de Tsukuttemita Keredo.

name: Space Engineers 2
description: Space Engineers 2 is an open world sandbox game where engineering meets exploration, construction, and survival in the vastness of space. Become a pioneer in the distant Almagest system, a new uncharted world with infinite possibilities for creativity and discovery. Build everything from starships to space stations as you craft your own path in this highly anticipated next chapter of the Space Engineers series!

name: TriggerHeart Exelica Enhanced
description: TriggerHeart EXELICA Enhanced adds additional elements to the original TriggerHeart EXELICA, including Faintear as a new playable character, an opening movie produced by P.A.WORKS with a theme song sung by Ayane, an “Enhanced” story mode with additional high-resolution CGs, balance adjustments to existing characters, handy features from the original game (Training Mode, leaderboards, vertical screen support), and more.

name: Burger Shop Simulator 2024
description: This is a game developed in Japan where you can freely create hamburgers. You can use your bike to deliver burgers to your customers with a unique delivery system

name: A Bee Movie Game But Every Time You Beat It It Gets Faster
description: Sin descripción

name: Pathologic 3: Quarantine
description: Pathologic 3: Quarantine is a narrative-driven adventure about a young scientist in search of immortality and a mysterious plague outbreak in a small town. Learn how your story began and what drove a celebrated academic to leave his acclaimed lab. Examine patients, uncover strange secrets, and make first steps towards defeating Death.

name: Deadly Rehearsal
description: The rehearsal must be flawless. Every sound, every light timed perfectly. You are one of the best stage manager's after all. Failure is not an option. The play is cursed... and it demands perfection.

name: Walled City Sunset
description:
Welcome to Walled City!

You work here as an industrial climber. Fix AC units, talk to people, find lost cats, connect buildings and dream to witness the sunset at the top of the city.

name: Genshin Impact: Incandescent Ode of Resurrection
description:
Version 5.3 of Genshin Impact, which includes:
• New characters: Mavuika, Citlali, Lan Yan, and the Pyro version of the Traveler
• New outfits for Hu Tao and Xiangling
• New main story quest: Archon Quest, Chapter V - Act V "Incandescent Ode of Resurrection"
• New Tribal Chronicles quest for the Masters of the Night-Wind, and new story quest for Mavuika
• New permanent game mode: Repertoire of Myriad Melodies
• New main event: Springtime Charms
• New quality of life features
• …and more!

name: The Campsite
description:
The Campsite is a short point-and-click adventure game, inspired by and crafted in the style of early genre classics, and adapted for a modern-day experience.

If you have a passion for graphic adventures but never find the time to play, this might be exactly what you’re looking for.

With about 60 minutes of gameplay, a simplified UI, and no dialogue trees, it is an excellent choice for casual players. It can be played anytime, alone or with others, and is suitable for all ages.

For those new to classic point-and-click adventures, The Campsite is a great starting point. Featuring a balanced difficulty level and lighter gameplay, it offers an accessible and enjoyable experience for beginners, and hopefully, you’ll be captivated by the magic that makes this genre so special!

name: Wuthering Waves: All Silent Souls Can Sing
description:
Version 2.0 of Wuthering Waves is the game's first major post-release update, and it includes:
• New characters: Carlotta and Roccia
• New region: Rinascita, with several new areas
• New story quests: Prologue - Through the Sea Thou Break
• New exploration systems
• New echoes, events and more!

name: Honkai: Star Rail - Paean of Era Nova
description:
Version 3.0 of Honkai: Star Rail is the game's second major post-release update, and it includes:
• New characters: The Herta, Aglaea, and the Remembrance path for the Trailblazer
• New character path: Remembrance
• New Trailblaze mission
• New planet: Amphoreus
• New quality of life updates
• …and more!

name: Pent's Zacky, Zany Road Trip to Adulthood
description:
Since the dawn of Pentagon, the five-sides ones achieve full adulthood by driving the famed 'Most Dangerous Road in the World'. Today, destiny calls out to our bored protagonist Pent to fullfill this Herculean task.

Explore a big world of unyielding nonsense that simply refuses to take itself seriously at any point. Earn money by completing wild races, taking pictures of strange phenomena (and appease the Government) or by just finding it on the ground in some ditch. There are also some puzzles, I suppose.

name: I Can Save This!
description: A tiny platformer about trying to avoid a break-up.

name: Level
description:
Somehow you are locked in a strange room.
Find the hidden items and solve the riddle to escape.

name: Baptisterio
description: With an analog camera, a gift from my father, a photo of the missing tourists and the illusion of my first big news I prepare to enter with the brothers to the enigmatic baptistery.

name: Pixel Dungeon RPG
description: Dive into procedurally generated dungeons filled with hidden treasures, cunning traps, and fierce monsters. Customize your hero with a vast array of weapons, armor, and magical items. Engage in strategic turn-based combat, solve intricate puzzles, and uncover the rich lore of the dungeon. Face formidable bosses and adopt loyal pets to aid you in battle.

name: Runes of Legend
description: Runes of Legend is an immersive pixel adventure game set in a captivating fantasy world filled with mystery and magic. You can step into the role of a courageous adventurer tasked with exploring a once-peaceful land now threatened by the resurgence of dark forces.

name: Madness Below
description: Madness Below is a RPG dark fantasy horror game developed by Sif Kamira that began development in November 2024.

name: Kero Quest 64
description: Kero Quest 64 is a Collectathon 3D Platformer inspired by other games in the genre, especially those from the late 90s. You take control of Kero, a blue frog seeking to stop a prince from abusing his newly gained powers by collecting Magical Shards around the kingdom.

name: Ys vs. Trails in the Sky: Alternative Saga
description:
Finally, the walls between Falcom's legendary RPG series, Ys and Trails, are broken for the ultimate dream match up! Fan-favorite heroes and rivals clash in battles once thought impossible, with support from beloved characters across Falcom's classic titles to aid you in the fight!

This new version of the PSP title features remastered graphics, online multiplayer, English translation and voice acting, and other new features.

name: Arima Lodge
description: Arima Lodge is a free, 5-minute, fixed-camera short story that takes place entirely inside an elevator. It features limited dialogue options from Kai's perspective, and on-screen QTE events to open and close the elevator doors when a new character enters.

name: Katana Dragon
description:
Katana Dragon is an action-RPG adventure and dungeons exploration, where you play as the ninjas Shin and Nobi in their quest to end the curse that hangs over Sogen.
Learn ninja skills, upgrade your Dragon Gems, equip the Cursed Seals and level up. Avoid traps, solve puzzles and fight powerful enemies.
Your ninja way begins!

name: A War On Christmas 3: World War C
description: The third installment in the "A War on Christmas Series" featuring 12 maps of Christmas Mania.

name: Zenoken
description:
A stealthy space opera metroidvania where actions have consequences.
The stars call the Chinokitsune a space pirate--& often an assassin--but stranded on a strange alien world after a failed heist, It's up to you to reckon with your own past & motivations to thwart an ancient evil & maybe find love.

name: Cereal Killer
description: Follow Milton, a farmer who witnesses strange events on his farm until he realizes that his cereal plantation is more alive than it should be..

name: Kick To Hell
description: In Kick To Hell you control Jeremiah returning home from work, until after desecrating a ritual, inexplicable things start to happen and something starts to chase you.

name: The Bag Man's Curse
description: This game follows a 12-year-old boy called Peter who, despite rumors of missing children, decides to leave home and ends up discovering macabre things.

name: Off
description: “I’m the Batter. I’ve been entrusted with a sacred mission.” -- One of the most influential RPGs of the last 20 years is finally coming to Steam and Nintendo Switch. Take control of the Batter as he seeks to purify an uncanny and hopeless world haunted by specters, guided by a cryptic, grinning cat called The Judge.

name: Haruka na Sora
description:
The censored release of the fan disc for Yosuga no Sora.
The fandisc features bonus scenarios and visual novel versions of web radio episodes. The bonus scenarios include routes for Kozue and Yahiro (who did not have routes in the original game), as well as an epilogue for Sora's main game route. Additionally, it includes a bonus scenario featuring the characters doing karaoke.

name: Perennial Dusk: Kinsenka
description:
Industry veteran Yukito Urushibara and prolific illustrator Saine join forces for the first time to craft a stunning tale about a group of young people in an eerie world of endless twilight. Follow their story as they struggle against limitless cruelty and confront the inescapable traumas of life and death together.

Perennial Dusk: Kinsenka is the latest visual novel written by Yukito Urushibara, whose work on Irotoridori no Sekai and Sakura Moyu captivated players with stories that inspire hope as readily as they induce despair.

name: Nekura na Classmate ga Ore no Ibukuro wo Tsukande Hanashite Kurenai
description: Sin descripción

name: Nippon Marathon 2: Daijoubu
description: Dash, dodge, and dive through the ultimate Japanese gameshow experience! Up to 4 contestants race through chaotic obstacle courses across Japan, filled with hilarious hazards and obscure obstacles. It’s so crazy, you’ll be shouting ‘Konnichi-what?!’ instead of ‘Konnichiwa!’

name: Justice Ninja Casey
description: The 16-bit classic comes to the West for the very first time! A princess in a castle has been kidnapped by a group of mysterious ninjas. Luckily for her, a young ninja named Casey is aware of the situation, and embarks on a mission to save her because... He is the Ninja of Justice!

name: Feudal Bros
description: Japan. Edo period. After many years of violent wars, peace has returned to the land, but it doesn’t seem like it will last for long. A new danger lurks in the shadows, and only two noblemen can stop it: Lord Baka, a Japanese feudal lord, and Prince Bouffon, a prince from the faraway land of France.

name: Dreams of Saturn 2.0
description:
This brand-new edition of Dreams of Saturn features an entirely new chapter that takes Ryo to Yokosuka Harbor for another fun-filled Christmas story! Packed with SEGA references and Easter eggs, including the legendary Segata Sanshiro, and follow the tale of Santa Maeno as he embarks on a mission to save Christmas for the residents of Yokosuka!

This release includes both Dreams of Saturn 1 and 2.0 as one full game, allowing you to select a starting point depending on if you are playing the entire game fresh or for the first time, or already experienced Dreams of Saturn 1 and wanted to jump straight ahead to the 2nd chapter.

name: Crosstown Carnage
description:
Crosstown Carnage is 1 large map that was originally conceived as a mini-episode.
After clearing the aliens out of the West Coast of the USA, Duke heads back east to start the cleanup there. From the tops of skyscrapers, Duke will have to navigate the city's old subway system to find where the Battlelord has been hiding.

Crosstown Carnage contains two new alien types: the Freeze Trooper and the Expander Trooper. The Freeze Trooper fires freezer blasts at Duke. These pack a punch, but won't immediately kill you. The Expander Trooper fires blasts of microwaves which will fry Duke. Hit enough, and Duke expands until he explodes. Both may drop their respective ammo when they die.

name: Replikant Chat
description: A fun and immersive experience for all, where you can interact in real-time with 3D characters like never before.

name: Throneheir
description: As the Champion of Avalon Kingdom, the knight Jethro is entrusted with the task of raising and training Prince Magnus, he who carries in his blood the prophecy that shall set the Kingdom free. On his journey to prepare the young Prince, he will learn about fatherhood, love and betrayal.

name: Thesaurus
description: Help Joan the warrior and her best friend Krista find peace and redemption in this RPG tale worth about 10-15 hours of playtime.

name: Golden Spatula
description: Golden Spatula is a champion auto-battler strategy mobile game. It is one of the ‘TFT franchise’ titles together with Teamfight Tactics and Teamfight Tactics Mobile from Riot Games, and is a mobile-exclusive game built primarily with the mobile audience in mind.

name: Clueless Crew
description: Scavenge through abandoned locations with your friends, buy tools, and venture further into eerie corridors and rooms filled with monsters and ghosts, then haul the loot back to the truck before dawn.

name: Ninja Ming
description: Embark on a thrilling 2D platforming adventure as Ninja Ming, a master of teleportation in this precision-based game. Navigate the challenging Path of Transcendence, where your teleportation skills are key to conquering obstacles and reaching new heights. As you progress through the Forest, Wind, Mountain, and Fire trials, each step is a chance to refine your skills and become even more formidable. Use your teleportation abilities to maneuver with speed and style, overcoming each new challenge that comes your way. The harder the trials, the greater your growth.

name: Tavern Legends
description: Tavern Legends is a medieval tavern simulation. Fulfill the needs of various patrons and design taverns according to your vision. Create your own meals, manage your inventory, and hire workers. Become a legendary tavern keeper!

name: Past Hope
description: A short story about a hopeless yandere.

name: Kiko and the Game Kids
description: Sin descripción

name: Mech Explorer
description:
In a post-apocalyptic world, a mercenary explores the ruins of an underground city,
piloting her mech, in search of her missing partner.

name: Nina: Season of Adventures
description: Sin descripción

name: Polar Roller
description: You're a snowman's head trying to get to your body. Collect snowflakes to get bigger and snowman parts (hat, nose, etc) to be more than just a pile of snow.

name: Mineral Defense
description: Mineral Defense combines tower defense with roguelite elements and procedural generation. Build paths, unlock upgrades, and unleash powerful synergies to conquer evolving challenges in an ever-expanding world.

name: Meatshot
description: MEATSHOT is a gory, action-packed shooter where you embody an unstoppable beast in a digital realm. Run along walls, dodge bullets, and pull off acrobatic gunfights in slow motion with pinpoint accuracy as you unleash carnage, taking down elite soldiers.

name: Tryptic
description: Sin descripción

name: Zundamon Castle
description: A very cute RTS! Modify the voxel ground and defend your castle with Zundamons! A game set in Japan's medieval period, created by Japanese developers.

name: Tower of the Ice Lich
description: A pixelated homage to 16-bit RPGs, this former print-and-play card game has come full circle as a digital experience! Choose your champion, enter the tower, and make wise decisions on your ascent to face the Ice Lich at the top

name: Antarah
description: A heroic journey awaits you with Antarah, the legendary hero and poet of ancient Arabia, Engage in thrilling battles, and fight for love and glory.

name: Steamboat Willie's Super Willie World
description: Join Steamboat Willie on a 1920s-style platforming adventure across 40 levels!

name: Alkatria
description: Alkatria is an MMORPG where you play as one of 3 character classes. Explore the secret corners of the continents in search of adventures, make friends, fight dangerous monsters, get unique items and have fun while spending time in the big world!

name: SpongeBob's Pizza Toss
description: SpongeBob's Pizza Toss is an online Flash game inspired by Paperboy where you must deliver pizza boxes to customers. There a a total of 3 levels in the game.

name: SneakBit
description: Awaken in a mysterious world teeming with danger, magic, and secrets. Collect keys, brave perilous dungeons, and confront the legendary Demon Lord—but beware, the prophecy holds surprises.

name: Squirreled Away
description: Sin descripción

name: The Emeralds' Awakening
description: Sin descripción

name: Power Rangers: Battle for the Grid - Adam Park
description: This unlocks Adam Park - MMPR Black Ninja Ranger, a full character, to be played in Power Rangers: Battle for the Grid

name: Power Rangers: Battle For the Grid - Jen Scotts: Time Force Pink Ranger
description: This unlocks Jen Scotts - Time Force Pink Ranger, a full character, to be played in Power Rangers: Battle for the Grid

name: Famulus
description: Famulus is a short retro-style shoot-em-up-and-down adventure game about kebabs made by me (programming, sounds, graphics) in about 2 weeks for Sewer Jam 5.

name: Tekken 7: Fated Retribution Round 2
description: Tekken 7: Fated Retribution Round 2 is an update to Tekken 7 arcade version.

name: Rusty Drill
description: Rusty Drill is a 32 map community megawad which began development back in 2023 to celebrate Scythe turning 20. ﻿This project was a continuation of the Scythe themed community project "Scythe: Re-sharpened" by EPICALL.

name: Furry Aim Trainer
description: Train your aim with a beautiful selection of Furry girls! Shoot the girls with various weapons, and have a fun time while practicing!

name: Shoot Away Pro
description: Shoot Away Pro is an arcade light gun shooting game. Players use a plastic gun to shoot at targets on a projection screen.

name: Kandinhale
description: Kandinhale is a story-driven short RPG game in which you'll have to escape from the clutches of Kandinhale, the company that owns almost the entire consumable market in this idyllic candy world.

name: Ginger's Letter to Santa
description: "This is it! This year I will cook the best roast Christmas dinner the Zodiacs has ever seen! They will all scream for more and then nobody will try to eat me, no more no more!" Join Ginger, Sullyvan, and the Gonk on this RPG Christmas Adventure as they deliver their letters to Santa's Factory!

name: Tales Beyond The Tomb: The Farm's Secret
description:
"Tales Beyond The Tomb" is a chilling episodic horror series that plunges players into the shadows of real-life cases.

This is the second episode of the series:

Episode 2: The Farm's Secret
Dragged into a web of secrets and lies, Samantha seems to be part of a puzzle impossible to solve. What once seemed obvious soon turns into something far more sinister, and the line between villain and victim begins to blur.

Nothing is as it seems. How far will you go to uncover the truth?

name: CELL 0: Cyber Entertainment Leisure Lounge
description: CELL is a short non-linear visual novel in a post-apocalypse/cyberpunk setting. Kenzo is an artificially grown human who lived his entire life alone isolated with a sweet, but artificial service intelligence. He's not okay. Help him to go through the disturbing situation he's about to get into.

name: DougDoug's Basement: How I Got a Sea Otter A Promotion!
description:
"Created for the DougDoug Rosa Charity Stream of 2024, DougDoug's Basement: How I Got a Sea Otter A Promotion! regales the epic quest of a Bell Pepper, an otter, Pajama Sam, and Luther on their unexpected quest to defeat the three Peggle Masters" - the officaal website.

A visual novel themed after the streamer/comedian DougDoug and the lore, characters, and videos he creates.

name: Starship
description: An unofficial port of Star Fox 64 for PCs including enhancements.

name: Froggo's Adventure: Drifting Sky
description: Froggo's Adventure: Drifting Sky is another Simple retro 2D Platformer about Froggo on a side-scrolling adventure. Froggo had multiple dreams about seeing a mysterious figure. Wondering if any of these dreams have any meanings, Froggo goes on an adventure to find the answer...

name: Clinical Trial
description: A suspense tale about signing up to test psychiatric drugs for money and provider-patient relations.

name: ChronoClock
description: Next in line to manage a multi-million dollar corporation is our protagonist, Rei Sawatari. He inherited one very important heirloom from his late grandfather: a single pocket watch that grants him a mysterious power— The power to go five minutes back in time.

name: Kalak
description: Discover “Kalak”, the ideal application for those who love challenges! Test your knowledge in geography, literature, history, science, general information and various other categories in a fun and entertaining way. Through the application, you can create your own game with family and friends and add them to your game for the challenge. Suitable for competition lovers and entertainment lovers. “Kalak” is your ideal application for an educational experience. Exciting, download now and start testing your knowledge!

name: Party Versus
description: A mixed reality game. Play dozens of minigames and clinch victory by winning the coveted neon Party Crown. Whether you’re playing Sticky Potato, Spike Attack, or Milky Way Moovers, you will have hours of fun - and chaos - in this wacky multiplayer experience.

name: King Of Sails
description: Exciting PvP naval warfare with 18th century ships! Sail into a world of historical battles and be a captain in the golden age of shipbuilding! Conquer the seas in exciting online battles!

name: Polywar
description: Well, you've come to the right place, buddy! Join POLYWAR — the international multiplayer first-person shooter without auto-shooting — enter the war zone and gain your first frag! In this breathtaking 3d shooter game with modern graphics you will find all that you need for the grand battle — various maps, plenty of characters, the possibility of weapon customization, different game modes, marketplace for players and many other cool features.

name: Kingdom Come: Deliverance II - Day One Edition
description: A thrilling story-driven action RPG, with a rich open world, set in 15th century Medieval Europe. Experience the ultimate medieval adventure - through the eyes of young Henry - as you embark on a journey of epic proportions.

name: Kingdom Come: Deliverance II - Collectors' Edition
description:
Kingdom Come: Deliverance II Collector’s Edition
This is the ultimate in Kingdom Come: Deliverance II goodness. You’ll get everything that’s found in the Gold Edition – the standard edition, Expansion Pass and Gallant Huntsman’s Kit plus the Lion's Crest Bonus Quest. What’s more, you’ll also get a statue of Henry and his trusty steed, Pebbles; the exclusive cloth map Alleys of Kuttenberg; the enamel pin set Coats of Valor; the iconic Letter of Hope - which Sir Hans Capon was entrusted with; and the King’s Rebels collectable cards set.

name: Stellar Code
description: Mysterious phenomena from space. A researcher's fatal accident. Cryptic codes engraved on an unknown material. Together with your brilliant sister-in-law, you must unravel a mystery that could determine the fate of Earth. A sci-fi mystery visual novel of discovery and suspense.

name: Smoky White
description: A short visual novel set on a snowy winter rooftop, where you meet and part ways with a mysterious upperclassman. The story branches into different endings based on your dialogue choices.

name: Bat Galaxy
description: Half on-rails shooter, half exploration-driven adventure. Zoom into a world where billions of bullets surround you and your handy punch feature can send enemies flying.

name: Hidden Tomatoes
description: Hidden Tomatoes is a relaxing hidden object game where you search for 100 hidden tomatoes in a detailed city environment. Explore the streets, buildings, and alleys at your own pace, with no time limits or pressure. Can you spot all the tomatoes?

name: Bloody Cleanup
description: A co-op roguelike horror game where you descend in an endless elevator and complete assigned tasks. Each floor brings new monsters, new locations, and new challenges.

name: Soul Shuffler
description: In this card-based roguelite, you'll be a demon specializing in the souls of inanimate objects. Explore the ever-changing Limbo, defeat and collect the countless souls within, use them to expand your Domain, and dominate the Infernal Tournament with your mad soul-shuffling skills to make Hell yours!

name: Wind Breaker: Furyou-tachi no Eiyuutan
description: An RPG based on the anime 'Wind Breaker'. Features the voice cast of the anime reprising their roles.

name: Luna and the Wasted City of Sin
description: A ruin-delving turn-based RPG. After taking on a request, half-beast Luna heads into the overwhelmingly shady ruins, but finds only evil monsters running rampant within... Each time you enter the ruins, the enemies and traps you encounter will change.

name: Cat Tree
description: Cat Tree is a relaxing indie game. Collect cats, watch them grow on your tree, and unlock new sections of it. Gather rare, epic, and legendary cats to create a unique collection and uncover all the secrets of the tree!

name: Tiled Together
description:
Spend coins to spin the slot machine and earn coins by joining tiles together. Some tiles will give coins for being adjacent to other certain tiles. There are many tile group combinations to discover that each has different adjacency bonuses and point values. Earn as many points as you can before you run out of coins!

There are a handful of tile combinations. Place four of the same tile types together! Or try surrounding your tile on all sides. Bankruptcy is inevitable, but there's always a new map to draw up and new Share your biggest discoveries with other mapmakers, or spread rumors of the creatures that inhabit the deepest waters.

Maps are Tiled Together in this world. Journeys are revealed with the turning of ancient ceremonial tiles. By will alone, you create the landscape for adventurers, merchants, and miscreants. Bring together townsfolk to develop cities, reveal the path to an oasis in the middle of endless sands. Lay the world out in front of everyone. Your craft is a gamble but not without its rewards. A new discovery could result in a windfall of gold and renown!

name: The Ultimatum: Choices
description: Jump into the whirlwind social experiment of "The Ultimatum" in this narrative dating sim, where you'll create a character and make high-stakes choices to shape your own love story.

name: Elflock

description: Conquest of Elysium is a fantasy game where you and your friends take control of a powerful warlord or wizard and struggle for total control of the continent. Up to eight players may participate and the computer can control any free players. The game is turn-based so you only need one computer to play the game with up to seven friends.

name: Tetris
description:
Tetris for the Chromatic (an FPGA based Game Boy Color handheld) is a game released on December 1, 2024. It is a Game Boy and Game Boy Color game that is bundled with the Mod Retro Chromatic.

The game features modern and retro game settings, as well as the standard modes: marathon, sprint, ultra, and endless.

Players can customize various options, including toggling the ghost piece, selecting from two speed curves, toggling the hold function, and choosing between the bag or random pieces. Players can input a 9-digit seed to determine piece sequences, or leave it unset for a random seed every game.

Most mechanics follow standard guideline rules. Both IRS (Initial Rotation System) and IHS (Initial Hold System) are present. However, pieces are rotated on the first frame rather than entering pre-rotated, which means they cannot prevent a block out.

About fifty inventions lie between you and the moon. Thousands of components will flow into and through the ever-growing sequence of your machines, providing the means to explore the next level of technology.

Your entire factory will be put to a test as final products flow into the Data Centre, programming the Guidance computer of your Spaceship. Every step of the way is different, some may even differ depending on the generation seed of your World.

Tired of the grind? Fund the operation with coin provided either from various errands, or your chosen professions. Automatically ship produce from your farms or gather other players to aid you in your mission. Then you can purchase all manner of resources, artifacts and building blocks from the market.

name: Emberfall
description:
Emberfall is the first roguevania-survivor: a roguelite, metroidvania, and survivor-inspired action-platformer.
You must extract from the deadly catacombs of the fallen citadel "Lemia" in less than 10 minutes.
Emberfall puts you in control of Kali, who defeated the God of Greed and the Goddess of Light. Now, the gods have failed, and the citadel will collapse.
Tough and fast, with snappy controls and endless challenges.
Enjoy an idling-combat system and focus on finding your way out while dodging enemies.
The game offers a simple but enjoyable roguelite system.
Purchase upgrades across your runs to become more powerful from the start.

name: PR: Rivenverse
description:
PR:Rivenverse is a story-focused RPG developed in RPGMaker(MV).

Taking place thousands of years after the annihilation of Humanity, focusing on a new 'elemental' based society built over the remains of the Earth, created by several Gods and ruled by its twelve Maintainers.

But we all know that there is rarely any society that thrives completely devoid of threat, as a recently formed organization known as the Fatali Stellae has been participating in a handful of questionable activities under the guise of their organization simply being business-related.
Thankfully, there are a few who are already aware of their true intentions and misdeeds, and may even soon put everything about them into light.

name: Fading Remnants
description: The earth has changed these past few years. Humanity is a lonely shell of what it once was, and the world is a very different place. In the face of such hardship, how does one cope with loss, and how far would you go for family?

name: Secret of the Abbey
description: Embark on a journey through the underground of an 18th-century abbey. As you explore the abbey, you'll encounter a series of puzzles that reveal its mysterious past. Unravel the secrets that led to the abbey's demise in this atmospheric adventure.

name: Binary Star Hero
description:
Binary Star is the country's top Super Hero. His light shines bright against any darkness... but the brighter the light illuminates, the darker the cast shadow becomes.

Discover who Binary Star is behind the mask.

name: Love Hex
description: A short and silly horror RPG featuring a yandere monster.

name: Rezarus
description: Rezarus is a futuristic online tank game inspired by an old world game called Tanarus. Multiplayer tank battles!

name: Sanyou Pachinko Paradise 9: Shin Umi Okawari!
description:
Pachinko Paradise 9 is one of the many titles in Irem's long-running pachinko simulation series. It features faithful 3D recreations of two pachinko machines made by Sanyo Bussan: CR Shin Umi Monogatari M56 and CR Shin Umi Monogatari L52. There are two modes available: Tsūjō (Normal) mode allows the player to modify a wide range of settings for each machine, while Jissen (Battle) mode challenges the player to win as many balls as possible on the default settings with a limited starting pool and time limit. There is also a View mode where the various animations that play on the in-game display can be freely viewed.

The popular Pachi-Pro Fūunroku story mode returns with Pachi-Pro Fūunroku 2: Senjukannon no Nazo, a direct sequel to the first installment which picks up the story right where it left off before. The protagonist has just arrived at Shinkai Town, following a lead to find his father's killer. The game proceeds much the same as before, with the player moving between different locations speaking to other characters and playing pachinko. In addition to the three pachinko halls and the player's apartment, there are also now a restaurant and a shrine, where different story events may occur. It is also now possible to learn and use special moves for use in the pachinko battles. As before, it is possible to pursue a relationship with one of five different girls, with the game's ending changing accordingly.

name: Sanyou Pachinko Paradise 11: Shin Umi to Saraba Gintama no Ookami
description:
Pachinko Paradise 11 is one of the many titles in Irem's long-running pachinko simulation series. It features faithful 3D recreations of two pachinko machines made by Sanyo Bussan: CR Shin Umi Monogatari M8Z and CR Shin Umi Monogatari M6Z. There are two modes available: Tsūjō (Normal) mode allows the player to modify a wide range of settings for each machine, while Jissen (Battle) mode challenges the player to win as many balls as possible on the default settings with a limited starting pool and time limit. There is also a View mode where the various animations that play on the in-game display can be freely viewed.

Pachi-Pro Fūunroku returns again with Pachi-Pro Fūunroku 3: Saraba Gindama no Ōkami, concluding the storyline introduced in the first title. The game returns to the adventure style of the first two titles, but adds a much greater degree of freedom to affect the outcome of the story. There are a large number of locations to visit apart from the pachinko parlors, and there are several very different endings that can be reached depending on the player's choice. The relationship system has also returned with several new girls to pursue, for a total of eleven.

name: Poppin & Jupa: Pocket Adventure
description: An action-adventure exploration game in which you play as a pair of young adventurers: The ladybug boy Poppin, and the scarecrow girl Jupa. Using the mysterious Gadget Box, Poppin and Jupa combat baddies, get around tricky challenges, and collect treasure as a team. In this adventure, the pair are traveling up to explore the grandiose Mount Glitteroam; what friends, foes, and secrets will they find along the way? Come and find out!

name: Dead Christmas
description: Step into the boots of Santa Claus himself, facing a nightmare like no other. A peaceful North Pole is thrown into disarray when an alien spacecraft crashes near Santa's village, unleashing a deadly virus that infects his loyal elves.

name: Gakkou wo Tsukurou!! Happy Days
description:
Gakkou o Tsukurou!! Happy Days: Is the first game in the series to be released in the Playstation 2 console. This simulation titles makes you the principal of a school, placing you in charge of management and renovating the school grounds. You get to decide everything, including the creation of your campus and even the rules of your school. Communication with your students is also important to building a strong environment.

The Gakkou o Tsukurou series places the player in the principal of a school, placing him in charge of management and renovating the school grounds. The player decides everything: The place and the new buildings, the professors, the new places of the school, etc.

The game features 6 different kind of school principals to choose one at the beginning of the game.

name: Undertale Red
description: Sin descripción

name: Mombo Combo Legacy
description: Get ready for an epic journey into the vibrant universe of Mombo Combo Legacy, a platform game full of action and adventure! Defeat monstrous enemies and complete insane challenges to create incredible combos. Conquer powerful forms and unlock MOMBASTIC abilities to explore memorable worlds!

name: Animal Night Market
description:
Today is your first day when you decide to start your career as a night market owner!
Here, you can create your own must-see night market.
R&D of food, decoration of stores, management of employees... Every step requires your careful management!
Away from the endless overtime, watching the desolate town become more and more prosperous with your efforts, you also rediscover the meaning of life.

name: Shore of Jord
description: Shore of Jord is a story-driven cRPG set in an alternate world of Europa, where you take on the role of a retired military officer trying to resolve mysterious events from your past and survive the longest winter in history: strengthen or break friendships, find your love, and discover who you are.

name: Travelling At Night
description: Travelling At Night is a dialogue-driven choices-matter CRPG. In the myth-scarred Europe of a very alternate Cold War, a hollow man with a shattering secret forges new goals to fill the emptiness inside. Choose sides; choose motives; choose your History.

name: Project Darkness
description: Sin descripción

name: Arkanoid
description:
Port of Arkanoid for Amiga.

Arkanoid is an arcade game developed by Taito in 1986. It expanded upon Atari's Breakout games of the 1970s by adding power-ups, different types of bricks, and a variety of level layouts. The title refers to a doomed "mothership" from which the player's ship, the Vaus, escapes.

name: Sonic Zeta Overdrive
description: Sin descripción

name: Pinball
description: Pinball is a digital pinball game for the PSP that takes unique advantage of the handheld unit's 16:9 screen. Players are required to rotate the system such that the 16:9 screen becomes a vertical playing field, just like a real pinball machine's dimensions! Developer Hudson Soft has worked to recreate the feel of playing real pinball, right down to sounds recorded from a real pinball game - but they also make sure to add digital effects that only a gaming machine can handle. bit sounds that were recorded from a real pinball game, but adds digital effects that only a videogame system can achieve. There's also single-cart multiplayer, meaning you can play Pinball with your friends, but you only need one UMD to share the game between your PSPs!

name: Sokocrab
description: Step onto the sandy shores of SokoCrab, a captivating puzzle game where you guide a clever crab through 40 engaging levels. Your mission? Push barrels onto designated spots to clear the path to the next stage, all while navigating a vibrant beach-themed world.

name: Swarm Madness
description: Your fortress is under constant attack, and you must save everyone who counts on you. Keep the walls strong and keep the mutants from getting inside.

name: Aquarun
description: Dive into the vibrant world of AquaRun, a fast-paced 2D pixel art platformer that tests your reflexes, precision, and determination! Inspired by the best of hardcore platforming games, AquaRun challenges you to guide a fragile yet determined character through 40 meticulously designed levels filled with relentless obstacles, devious traps, and tricky platforms.

name: Siren Head: Sound Of Despair
description:
In Siren Head: Sound of Despair, you immerse yourself in a grim post-bombardment Belgrade set in 1999. You are thrown into a desperate search for your missing husband during your camping trip. The search intensifies when you cross paths with the menacing Siren Head, an aberration you must defeat.

The game is a powerful blend of survival horror, mystery and adrenaline-pumping action.

name: Panic Room
description: In Panic Room, your space will be invaded and destroyed by thousands of spiders and then become the set of one of Hollywood's most famous horror scenes.

name: Senpai Sentinel
description: Step into the world of LunaAkari, a beloved anime streamer who vanished under chilling circumstances during a live broadcast. As a devoted fan and member of the “Moonlit Guardians” fan club, you’ve been tasked with remotely monitoring her otaku-themed house to uncover the truth behind her mysterious disappearance.

name: Catfall
description: A lone astronaut cat survives a spaceship crash and now embarks on a journey to find the crew: his feline friends and his dearest human.

name: A Very Thiefy Christmas Special
description: Grab a hot cup of peppermint cocoa and snuggle into your favorite holiday jammies for a comfy, cozy little Christmas mission.

name: Siren Head: The Hunt Continues
description:
Siren Head: The Hunt Continues is the sequel of the first person horror shooter Siren Head: Sound of Despair by Poison Games, and this time you are back in the woods to take him down.

There is nine missions in this game. Some you play as male and some as female.

name: Do Not
description: Do Not is an analog horror game set in a '90s donut fast food restaurant. You're the night shift worker at a Donut&Go on the outskirts of town. Few customers, lots of silence... but try not to die of fright!

name: TinkerShot
description: TinkerShot is a turned-based Spell Building rogue-like, You fight enemies by creating custom spells and launching them at enemies. Grow an arsenal of spells and items to overcome the world of TinkerShot.

name: Between These Dark Walls
description:
Things could potentially get messy tonight. I was on my way back home when some tough boys ambushed me. They weren't looking for money or anything, they just wanted to kill me right there in the street. Fortunately, I managed to run away unscathed, but these guys are still looking for me. I've managed to piece together something from rumours and hearsays; turns out Messer Beric, an usurer I've done jobs for in the past, sold me out to Raputo, one of the City Wardens, in order to prove that he'll be loyal and pay his tributes. Apparently, Beric's business collapsed with DeWall's demise, and now he seeks the protection of Raputo. Not to mention, Beric's business was run right under Raputo's nose, but he was protected by DeWall at that time. In exchange for his 'good work', Beric received a priceless necklace as a reward, and keeps it stashed in his crumbling castle in Newmarket.

Now is time for some sweet revenge; I am going to steal Beric's necklace and humiliate him; that'll teach him never to double-cross me. I should also steal some valuables along the way, just to show Raputo how I deal with his reckless threats. Raputo doesn't like independents operating within his turf, so I'll make sure to plunder the neighbourhood. I got to be careful, though. With DeWall's downfall, The City became more dangerous than ever. Thugs and assassins are on the loose in the dark, and lawmen and Hammerites prowl the streets in search of heretics and criminals alike. Cragscleft has never been so full.

name: Endless Rain
description: Sin descripción

name: Forge
description: A Magic The Gathering card simulator with multiplayer, singeplayer and adventure modes. It runs on java and is available for windows and android.

name: Running Through Backrooms
description: Welcome to Running Through Backrooms, an immersive horror experience that plunges you into the eerie and unsettling world of the Backrooms. Navigate through seemingly endless hallways and abandoned rooms. Each level presents a unique challenge, combining the thrill of parkour with the terror of the unknown.

name: Siren Head: Terrifying Story
description: Siren Head: Terrifying Story is a Adventure game developed by Poison Games.

name: Cutie Panda
description: Cutie Panda is a panda-raising app. You can set timers for your panda to remind you to drink water, attend meetings, complete office tasks, or follow any healthy habits you choose. Your panda grows and levels up as you feed it bamboo and play games within the app.

name: Galeid.
description: Sin descripción

name: The Dark Gift
description:
You woke up in the basement of your home and don’t remember anything...

When you go up to the house, you see the Christmas decorations and garlands and remember that it is family holiday time and time to get ready for it, while your wife and son went out to the store to do some shopping...

Suddenly the doorbell sounded. Opening the door, you see that someone left you a gift box...

What's inside this mysterious box?!

name: Bearly Escape
description:
Wild animals should roam free, but Kidd, a deranged scientist (the game’s antagonist), ventures into the forest to capture animals and use his twisted “X Serum,” he freezes the animals and subjects them to extraction and compression devices that strip away their consciousness, trapping it inside dolls. These dolls are then stuffed into claw machines, imprisoning the creatures in a nightmarish state.

As the protagonist, you ( a forest protection volunteer) lead a peaceful life in Everwood, a town nestled near the forest—until one day, your beloved dog, Robin, goes missing. This leads you to discover Kidd’s sinister lab, where you discover his horrific experiments. Now, it’s up to you to embark on a daring mission: free the trapped consciousness of the animals, rescue them from the claw machines, and help them escape the clutches of Kidd’s evil control, venture dangerously through forest terrane to escape, ultimately returning them to their natural habitat.

The stakes are high, and time is running out. The wild is calling. It’s time to claw your way to justice!

name: Crushed
description: Corey’s winter break gets a lot more interesting when the love of his life, ahem, his newest crush moves to Thomastown. Can he convince the new kid to give him a chance or will he fumble at love once again?

name: R/nosleep: The Night Shift at Paradise Valley Pool
description: r/nosleep is a short horror game series with episodes inspired by and adapted from posts on the r/nosleep subreddit. Night Shift at Paradise Valley Pool episode is the story of a night shift pool maintenance worker and his bizarre experiences during his first day on the job.

name: Finally A NSMB2 Christmas Mod
description:
The first ever Christmas themed mod for New Super Mario Bros. 2!

This mod includes:
~ Brand New Levels with a Christmas theme!
~ Brand new and familiar festive graphics!
~ Tons of remodeled enemies and objects to fit the Christmas theme!
~ Custom Snow themed Worldmap!
~ A Soundtrack made up of many game franchises!
~ And much much more!!!

name: Mario Kart Midnight 2
description: A mod for Mario Kart Wii containing 200 new custom tracks, mostly focused on releases from 2023.

name: AAA Dynamic Scenes
description: AAA Dynamic Scenes allows you to transform your screen into a device that grants you power of surveying space and time. Immerse yourself in beautifully animated vistas from the farthest reaches of the universe - feast your eyes on the many futures and pasts from the great beyond. The application can also function as a screen saver displaying date and time over the scapes and at a touch of a button can turn each scene into a jigsaw puzzle providing you with entertainment. This product contains five scapes - your experience can be expanded by purchasing additional 35 vistas - please see available packs in items related to this product.

name: Gura Christmas 2024
description: Celebrate the Christmas season with a merry jigsaw puzzle with various Guras drawn by many talented Hololive artists!

name: 1994 Tune-up Community Project
description: The 1994 Tune-up Community Project is a 2011, 32-level Boom-compatible megawad created by members of the Doomworld community. It is a collection of remakes of levels from 1994 (and, occasionally, 1995) aiming to revise them to modern standards. It was started in 2008 by Snarboo, and coordinated by Travers Dunne (traversd) and GreyGhost.

name: Soul Ampz
description: Sin descripción

name: 300 Line Christmas: Naughty or Nice
description:
300 Line Christmas: Naughty or Nice is a community project targeting MBF21 (complevel 21). The project is inspired by Arsinikk and NinjaDelphox's Line Massacre Series and is the sequel to 200 Line Christmas.
As the 300 in the title ﻿suggests, each map was limited to 300 lines at most. In addition, each map was a collab effort between two map authors.
The miniwad comes with 4 maps (technically 7 if you could both "naughty" and "nice" versions of maps). All but the first map have a "naughty" and "nice" version with different aesthetics and gameplay. Each map includes two exits ("naughty" or "nice") and depending on which exits you choose, you can get up to 3 different endings!

name: Arachne's Stone
description: Arachne's Stone is a horror RPG Maker game about the backstory of a strange lad who wants to steal the "Wishing Jewel" from a house owned by the hungry arachne. There are seven endings, and you must clear them all to unlock the epilogue.

name: Realm of Lament
description: Realm of Lament is the second installment in the Arachne's Stone trilogy. In this story, we will explore the perspective of Thomas, a man who lost his mother in a tragedy ten years ago. On Christmas Eve, he meets and dates a giant witch woman. Everything seems sweet and romantic until something happens...

name: House of Arachne

name: Astral Break
description: Astral Break is a fusion of mech and roguelite action. Experience thrilling "thrust" controls that propel you through dynamic dungeons. Collect diverse modular armors to refine your combat style and experiment with endless synergies to craft your ultimate hero!

name: Safecracker: The Ultimate Puzzle Challenge!
description: The NDS port of the game adapts the puzzles to be suited for the console's double screens.

name: Just A Shadow Game
description: Hear me, pitiful mortals, for I shall reveal to you the path to true power - a demonic fusion of deckbuilding, ritual duels, and roguelite! I speak of a realm shrouded in darkness, where only the most wicked may thrive. Behold my masterpiece, "Just A Shadow Game".

name: Trails of the Last Day

Collect spirit fragments to summon and evolve companions, use cards to unleash powerful abilities, and uncover the secrets of the mystical realm to prevent its destruction.

name: Sentinel Agency
description: As a special investigator on a theme park island full of dinosaurs, you have to solve three murders while hidden forces try to stop you with brute force. Shoot, sneak, uncover secrets, survive.

name: Paper Battlefield
description: A strategy game where warfare takes place in a drawn world bound by the limits of a notebook. Experience a real-time strategy experience where all your units and structures are drawn with ink.

name: Winion Virus
description: A pixel-art visual novel horror game. It features adorable and charming graphics paired with a dark fairy-tale story full of unexpected twists. As a point-and-click adventure, your task is to fix the errors occurring within the computer.

description: Step into the world of timeless art with a playful twist! Cats of Mona Lisa is a relaxing hidden-object game where you explore beautifully reimagined classical paintings in search of ten mischievous cats cleverly hidden within each masterpiece.

name: Forma

name: Dreeg

Customize Dreeg's armor to gain power and unlock new abilities and upgrades for your energy weapon system as you take on the psychotic Xel'xan.

name: GoldStorm Pirates
description: GoldStorm Pirates is an immersive two-player shooting game that takes players on a thrilling pirate adventure. Battle hordes of undead pirates and mysterious sea creatures across five challenging levels, each culminating in a monstrous boss fight. Utilise double-handed guns and the iconic helm wheel to navigate the chaos, strategically combine shots for maximum impact, and uncover hidden treasures to power up your efforts. With stunning visuals, a pounding soundtrack, and intense co-op gameplay, GoldStorm Pirates is set to captivate players of all ages!

name: Libritopia: Librarian Simulator
description: Manage your own library! Organize and classify books however you like, furnish the space with shelves, help visitors find their books, and maintain silence to keep them happy!

Wonderful and tragic events are to follow suit, as all of her greatest wishes come true. However, as these things often go, her happiness does not come without consequence…

name: Meet Santa
description:
Did you ever want to meet Santa? Well, now you can! At least if you can win a match of Nutcracker Run!
Sir Creakwood is ready to take on any opponent—do you have the skill (or luck) to beat him? Roll your way to victory and burn this old wooden creature... for real... please, do it, this thing creeps me out! Who the hell designed these things?!

name: Gorgonia: A Gorgon's Tragedy
description: Gorgonia: A Gorgon's Tragedy is an RPG Maker horror game that reimagines the Gorgons’ origin story, offering a fresh perspective on the ancient myth. Step into the role of Medyuu, a beautiful lamia with unsettling secrets. Her sisters seem to glimpse something different in her—a haunting gaze that pulls her into a path of strange encounters and eerie discoveries.
