description: A puzzle roguelike that features strategic battles utilizing chess movement rules.

name: Mirage: Illusions
description:
What would it be like if the physics of the world went about how you perceived things?

Find out in this unusual spatial puzzle!

name: Restoring Falmay
description: An RPG about saving a fairy's homeland.

name: Christmas Jumper Jam
description: A jam using Arcane Dimensions, with a focus on jump boots featuring 9 maps. Get on your holiday jumper!

name: Sprunki Block Puzzle
description: Match and clear colorful blocks to rescue Sprunki!

name: The Elevator
description: Sin descripción

name: Safecracker
description: A puzzle game in mini-games format where your goal is to crack open a safe.

name: Final Sanctuary
description: A year after the disaster, the bunker's life support systems fail critically. Communication with the outside world is completely lost. You are a mechanical engineer, awakened in your quarters by a piercing siren, alone and cut off from the world.

name: Sonic Mania Fangame
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Realmz
description: Sin descripción

name: Project Spikepig
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Incursion
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Medley
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Skywind: Episode II
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Reboot
description: Sin descripción

name: The Places Where Snow Lingers
description: A short walking simulator in N64 style. You and your companion come across an abandoned town and have a conversation on whether you should stay there or keep going.

name: Skeppskatten går iland
description:
An educational game for kids teaching Swedish words when they have just started to learn reading and writing.

The game will teach:
- Read and writing
- Consonant lengthening
- Word comprehension
- Synonyms
- Phonics
- Create with text and image

name: The Corn Maze
description: Navigate a haunting corn maze in this atmospheric exploration game. Manage your flashlight battery, search for compasses, and uncover eerie secrets while avoiding what lurks in the shadows. Simple mechanics, immersive tension—can you find your way out?

name: Tower Wizard
description: Help a wizard construct the mightiest wizard tower in this short incremental game!

name: Sub Terra Draconis: The Golemworks
description: A dusty tunnel to the side leads to an old dwarven construction facility. Disused parts of golems and other machinery litter the ground. There is surely treasure here, but these tunnels won't lead him to the outside of the mountain!

name: Slender Killer
description: Slender Killer was a hidden level in Slender: The Nine Pages. The author have decided to make it standalone so everybody can play it.

name: Panelak
description: Panelak Panelak is a post-Soviet old apartment building where weird things happen. Can you manage to get to the roof and save the helpless man?

name: Battow: Mages And Monsters
description: Battow - Mages And Monsters is a bouncing bullet game, the player clicks somewhere on the screen for the Mage to throw a spell in that direction. The spell bounces off the walls of the scene, and the player will need to use this to their advantage to hit the rival. Every time the player collects a chest or shield, he is protected for one round, that is, will defend himself if he is hit by the monster's spell. It's a relaxing atmosphere game, simple and easy to play. There are 5 Mages, 20 monsters and 100 levels.

name: Bilge Junction
description:
Welcome to Bilge Junction, population 8: a dying town on the arctic highway. With the promise of a cheap roof over your head, you ran from your problems and wound up here.

But winter's setting in, and the fire keeps burning. A storm is on its way. There's something lurking in the pipeline that built the town. In three days' time, it's bound to escape.

name: Breaker Initiating
description: BREAKER: INITIATING is a short 3D game featuring platforming and puzzle-solving elements. You step into the role of El, a robot equipped with electrical discharge abilities. Navigate through a desolate world, using El's unique powers to overcome obstacles and explore mysterious environments.

name: Find or be Found
description:
Find or Be Found is an asymmetric co-op horror game. Go on heists as a pair of burglars looking for the most valuable items in haunted houses. Locate the specific item to earn money and progress, but search for too long, and unimaginable horrors will awaken.

Play as either the hacker or the robber. Only the hacker knows what to steal and where to find it, and only the robber inside the house can grab it. Communication is key.

name: Cutucadores
description: Sin descripción

name: Neva: Devolver Deluxe Edition
description:
Neva: Devolver Deluxe will include the following exclusive items, besides the physical game:
· A stunning softbound 88-page artbook showcasing concept art and game art.
· A copy of the game’s original soundtrack by Berlinist, on a CD and as digital download.
· A collector’s tuck-in box housing all the contents.

Neva is an emotionally charged action-adventure from the team behind GRIS.

name: One Last Story
description: Do a writer's last words mean anything to the living? A story about death and the (idealization or fear of a possible) future.

name: Gyro Shooter
description: A Multiplayer motion-controlled shooting game, using your phone as a gun on a screen connected via a local network.

name: Violeta
description: After feeling marginalized by society, a young trans woman decides to venture out into the post-apocalyptic world to find a place she can call home.

name: Skate3DRPG
description: Sin descripción

name: Conqueror Of The Galaxy
description:
Conqueror Of The Galaxy is a 2D bullet hell space shooter that puts you in command of powerful spaceships as you conquer galaxies.

With vibrant graphics and intense gameplay, you’ll face waves of enemies, dodge deadly projectiles, and use strategic skills to overcome epic challenges.
With each battle, you’ll be able to upgrade your ship, unlock new features, and conquer galaxies, establishing yourself as the greatest Conqueror in the Universe. Step onto the battlefield and show off your skills!

name: RhythMania
description: An upcoming vibrant rhythm anthology filled with over a dozen dynamic mini-games with minimalistic inputs across musical genres and visual styles!

name: Conradito Cafézito
description: It costs the price of a coffee – but it lasts much longer! Conradito Cafézito, is an idle and incremental game where you unlock recipes, automate processes, and expand your coffee empire while watching your profits rise with every click!

name: Sertão Profundo
description: Sin descripción

name: Varg
description: A love letter to the classic MS-DOS “boomer” shooter genre, in a setting loosely inspired by Brazil's most iconic UFO case. When your son goes missing, take to the streets in search of answers. Unravel the secrets of a shadowy corporation and an alien-worshiping cult that has taken over your town.

name: Dominium
description: Sin descripción

name: Eco Farm Green
description: A clicker with global warming resource management in which your goal is to reduce your carbon footprint as much as possible while maintaining your plantation.

name: Glitch
description: Glitch :) would have been a great, calm and fun game... If it weren't completely corrupted. A terrible virus has invaded the game's files and left it completely bugged. Fortunately, when even the hero of the story gets completely stuck, from the confines of the game's files, there's hope...

name: Ivayami: Cradle of Fog
description: Four friends decide to visit an abandoned city. When the trip is is suddenly cut short by a car accident, Cynthia Moriyama must traverse through the dense fog of Ivayami searching for her missing friends. Beware, as the fog hides more than you imagine

name: Sovereign's Enigma
description: Sovereign's Enigma is a 2D platformer with survival elements, in a densely interconnected cave, where the player needs to uncover the story of an ancient civilization to solve a mystery from the past. This game is a slow and immersive experience, with a strong focus on storytelling, atmosphere, and characters.

name: Oddcore
description: A retro roguelike shooter that lets you stylistically explode your way through endless hordes of corrupted entities in a liminal nightmare.

name: Medix
description: How much can a person endure, and what is the true value of human life? In this minimalist real-time strategy game about war medics, you fight for your own survival and that of others while the army is under constant pressure, retreating from a superior enemy. A narrative campaign, accompanied by hand-drawn illustrations, takes you through the story of physicians pushed to their breaking point in their fight for a sliver of hope.

name: Mini Asteroids
description:
Modern approach to the classic retro arcade.

You will control your rocket in a deep space surrounded by asteroids and sneaky aliens. Destroy them and avoid hitting any of them.
Collect power-ups and buy improvements. Choose between levels or arcade mode.

* Easy to learn, hard to master
* Sharp vector graphics
* Precise and smooth controls
* 50 levels and arcade mode
* power-ups and improvements

name: Khaos Tracks
description: Khaos Tracks is a high-energy rhythm game that combines heart-pounding beats, dynamic gameplay, and visually stunning neon environments. Players tap, their way through a variety of music genres, from smooth country grooves to electrifying synth melodies. With a sleek UI and bold neon accents, the game challenges players to match the rhythm of carefully crafted instrumental tracks. Featuring fast-paced action and a pulse-pounding soundtrack, Khaos Tracks is an immersive experience where every beat brings you closer to the edge of chaos.

name: Sacrarium Gelus
description: Sin descripción

name: Reaktor
description: Reaktor: A modern spin on the classic block-stacking game! Features 360° block stacking, mind bending goodness. Play solo, or team up with friends in local co-op, and climb the leaderboards to fame.

name: Keyboard Warrior RPG
description: From the co-creator of Good Knight, master the Art of Combat Typing! Keyboard Warrior RPG is a typing game that mixes Roguelike, Dungeon RPGs, Beat Em Up, and Fighting Games in this beautifully styled game. An educational game to improve your typing skills and reading speed and learn foreign languages.

name: SoftWar Cyber Fight
description: A Science-Fiction Visual Novel Role-Playing Game with a story centered on the cyberworld conflicts. New"SoftWars" are battles involving sentient softwares namely viruses and anti-viruses, deciding the fates of computer systems.

name: Drive Me Crazy
description: "Drive me crazy" is a game inspired by the urban legend "Yua Mikami's wedding and retirement event." You play as her fiancé, qiangzi, in this interactive adventure. During the game, you will be asked one question: "With Yua Mikami by your side, would you still have a change of heart?"

name: Infinity Nikki: Shooting Star Season
description:
Infinity Nikki‘s first major update, “Shooting Star Season,” available December 30 through January 23, introduces new storylines, platforming challenges, time-limited events, and of course, stunning outfits to ring in the new year.

During the Shooting Star Season, shimmering meteors will grace the night skies over Miraland as residents come together and cast their wishes upon the stars. Beyond these cosmic travelers and festive decorations, players will find a series of new activities, rewards, and ways to interact with the cozy open-world.

name: Blades of Mirage
description: Embark on an epic isometric action RPG set in a Southeast Asian-inspired world. As Mira, use your ability to create water-based weapons and explore ancient ruins scattered across unique islands. Confront corrupted, powerful creatures and solve intricate puzzles to secure the ancient relics.

name: Comma
description: Comma is a side-scrolling game that tells the story of a dream world where the player has to get out of there by following a mysterious figure.

name: Temukung: Cultivation in Drylands
description: Live on driest land in Indonesia, The Timorese adapted this difficult situation with corn’s cultivation, but the imperialism created disruption in Timor. Now get ready to manage Timor’s farming as Temukung and face many difficult situations in Timor from middle 19th century until World War II

name: Circle of Sparks
description:
Bringing forth a fusion of Rhythm Games with Decorating - Circle of Sparks allows you to decorate your room, mix and match various decorative themes as you tap your way through the rhythm game, discovering and unlocking songs from an ensemble of artists.

With your party members, experience original, licensed, and even collaboration songs! Adopt pets as you make yourselves at home in the World of Sparks.

name: Potion Promise
description: In a medieval fantasy world, a young witch finds herself inheriting a massive debt from her parents. With only 30 days to repay it, she must rely on her potion-making skills and cunning to gather rare ingredients and fulfill the demands of her customers, while uncovering shocking truths behind.

name: Fear The Unknown: Dave Story
description:
In the first episode of Fear the unknown ,In the game, you will play as one of the lucky ones who met them and survived.

This game offers a first-person narrative experience, blending walking simulation with elements of exploration, driving, drinking, and interactive conversations.

name: M's Cases: Chapter 1 - Vanishing of Melisma
description:
The first chapter of an adventure puzzle game. You will play as Mark, a cat detective just
starting out in a quiet little town where nothing much seems to happen. As you solve
one case after another, you'll slowly uncover the hidden mysteries that this sleepy town
has been keeping.

name: Mangui
description: Mangui is a turn-based roguelike game inspired by spooky traditional Korean folklore. Play as one of four protagonists, unraveling the mysteries of the dark Mangui mountains. Live to tell the tale in this dangerous world filled with ghouls and monsters!

name: Q Steps
description:
An educational games for young children to start learning English, the game has several courses divided up in areas, which themselves are different themes for building word comprehension. The game is based on a book called "English With A Smile".

The different areas are
- The Gatehouse (numbers)
- The Q family house (family relationships)
- The Paint Factory (colors)
- The Tailor's Shop (clothing)
- The Gym (parts of the body)
- The School (classroom)
- The Grocery Store (food)
- The Theater (feelings)

The game came in 2 CDs where CD 1 is the 4 first areas and CD 2 is the latter 4 areas. Later revisions of the game combined both CDs into 1 and as such there was no need to swap CDs while playing.

name: Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Seven Symphonies
description: From the creator of "Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Special Episode 0" comes another ROM hack which will continue the events of both Special Episode 0 and Explorers' late postgame! This time, the plot will unfold throughout the legendary Destiny Tower, which will have a drastically different nature to the one we already knew in several PMD titles.

name: Mizi No!: Kintsugi
description:
Oh hi! Good to see you here.
In case you liked the puzzles in Mizi NO! and crave more, you have come to the right place.
The "Kintsugi" DLC adds 20 more items focusing on repeating patterns. Of course, Mizi will happily knock them over. But only because it knows you like to glue them back together ;)

Kintsugi is the Japanese art of repairing broken pottery by mending the areas of breakage with lacquer and powdered gold. If you ever wanted to try this, this DLC is for you :)

name: Mizi No!: Everyday Objects
description:
Oh hi! Good to see you here.
In case you liked the puzzles in Mizi NO! and crave more, you have come to the right place.

The "Everyday Objects" DLC contains 20 colorful everyday objects that Mizi will happily knock over. But only because it knows you like to glue them back together ;)

name: Mizi No!: Playful Patterns
description:
Oh hi! Good to see you here.
In case you liked the puzzles in Mizi NO! and crave more, you have come to the right place.

The "Playful Patterns" DLC adds 20 more items focusing on repeating patterns. Of course, Mizi will happily knock them over. But only because it knows you like to glue them back together ;)

name: Mizi No!: Blank Slate
description:
Oh hi! Good to see you here.
In case you liked the puzzles in Mizi NO! and crave more, you have come to the right place.

The "Blank Slate" DLC is for the minimalists and players looking for a challenge. The items in this pack are designed to be more subtle and will challenge you to focus more on the puzzle shapes themselves!

The "Blank Slate" DLC contains 20 objects that Mizi will happily knock over. But only because it knows you like to glue them back together ;)

name: Nightmare Circus
description: Nightmare Circus is an action-adventure game where the player takes on the role of a Puppeteer trapped in the Nightmare Realm. Set out on a journey to find his friends and escape the nightmare!

name: Not Monday Cafe
description: Idle cozy restaurant management game that sits on the bottom of your screen. Create and manage your dream café. Build and customize your restaurant, grow crops, harvest your produce, and serve a variety of cuisines. Listen to jazz, chill, and transform your boring workday into a happy day.

name: The Quarantine
description: Experience a blend of survival horror and strategic management. Fortify your base, manage resources, and scavenge for supplies in a world overrun by monstrous creatures and corrupted by blight blooms.

name: Find The Truth
description: Find The Truth is a horror RPG puzzle game that revolves around a girl who has lost her memory due to an accident, and her journey to reclaim her lost memories. Your actions in the game will impact the story and lead to different outcomes.

name: The Sorcerer’s Detritus
description: A sokoban-like puzzle game.

name: Falling Rain
description: Falling Rain is a third-person anime shooting RPG game with advance movement mechanic. Immerse yourself in a post apocalypse world and experiences the character struggle and follow the character to the end of their story.

name: Big Trouble in Little Chimney
description: Krampus is Coming! Grab your Shotgun, finish your hot punch and don't forget your mission: Save the Christmas! Big Trouble in Little Chimney is highly-addictive and fast paced arena bullet-hell shooter.

name: Weyrdlets: Frosty Festivities
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Senseless Soccer
description: The best football rogue-lite ever made! Super Senseless Soccer has a unique twist: start with a normal football game, then add a large variety of illegal modifiers and game-changing Upgrade Tickets in order to trigger ridiculous combos. It's super! It's senseless! It's SOCCER!!!

name: Poop Killer 8
description: The poop killer now strikes in the middle of Christmas... smellier and deadlier. Embark on this shitty adventure and try not to end up with poop stuck in your mouth. With three meaningless endings...

name: Madness in the Banaverse
description: Madness in the Banaverse is a single player platform game that combines action and comedy with a cartoonish style, taking as its protagonist the famous YouTuber “El Bananero”, who provides his voice to give life to the character and the most iconic phrases.

name: Five Minutes Till Christmas
description: Race against the clock in Five Minutes Till Christmas, a fast-paced holiday arcade game! Sprint through a bustling mall to gather last-minute gifts, evade vigilant security guards, and complete as many whishes before the time runs out. Perfect your strategy to top the global leaderboards!

name: Tonya The Killer
description: Tonya the Killer offers a fast-paced action and strategy-filled survival adventure. With dynamic enemy battles, an immersive story, and addictive gameplay, every moment is packed with excitement. Step into Tonya's world and conquer the chaos!

name: Recettear: An Item Shop's Tale HD Edition
description: A remaster of Recettear to be released in 2025.

name: Mafia Online Town Asleep
description:
Card mafia, only with a choice of roles and online

Do you want to play mafia, but the company doesn't have enough players? Then you were looking for what you needed! Complete daily tasks, compete for rankings, join clans and fight for territories, and much more in our game!

The players are divided into two sides — mafia and civilians. The mafia's task is to kill civilians, and the civilians' task is to find the mafia and execute it by any means necessary. Can you lie to the city?

Our features: frequent game updates, the ability to choose your favorite role, responsive administration, many interesting roles with unique mechanics have been added, two game modes, including the classic one, close to the sports mafia, and much more!

name: Going Up
description:
How often have you stood and waited for an elevator, wondering why it’s taking so long,
why it’s moving so slow, and hey, why did it just pass your floor completely?

Going Up is a casual strategy game where you control groups of lifts in a skyscraper to
deliver passengers before they lose their patience. Optimise elevator movement to deal
with a fussy set of passengers: impatient CEOs, mean soldiers and confused tourists.
There is no one solution to elevator optimisation: every stage will have its unique
bottlenecks, passengers and problems.

Can you keep people moving, or will they have to take the stairs?

name: Wind Fantasy: NeXus
description:
Wind Fantasy:NeXus is a TBS game.
In collaboration with 10 Taiwan's popular VTuber in depth into the cooperation, tailored to create a dedicated main storyline and permanent presence in the game, the player will be together with them in the world of wind fantasy, and the legendary heroes together to embark on an epic adventure

name: Banebush
description: Banebush - is a non-linear and very red visual novel in the horror genre. Would you dare to step towards a fairy tale if it turns out to be true?

name: QSteps 1
description: This remake is the first CD of the original Q Steps, providing the 4 first areas.

name: QSteps 2
description: This remake is the second CD of the original Q Steps.

name: Mutation
description: Mutation is a procedural Dungeon Crawler Roguelite with survival and RPG elements, set in a sci-fi Lovecraftian theme: gain experience, unlock skills and new items, face increasingly dangerous threats, and escape through different paths while exploring multiple levels and uncovering the organization's secrets.

name: Dynasty Warriors: Origins - Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Digital Deluxe Edition pre-order bonus:
- Early access
Provides access to the game 72 hours before the official release.

name: Atomfall: Deluxe Edition
description:
Pre-order the Atomfall Deluxe Edition to receive:
• The entire Atomfall game
• 3 days Early Access
• “Story Expansion Pack” – (*not available Day 1):
• “Basic Supply Bundle” Pack
• “Enhanced Supply Bundle” Pack

name: Metro Awakening Deluxe Edition
description: 48 hour Early Access to the full game, and the Field Medic pack. The Deluxe Edition features the Memories of Polyanka pack—with a Nosalis Hide backpack skin, Nosalis Toy backpack charm, The Fallen backpack patch and Nosalis Skeletal glove skin—plus access to the digital VR Concept Art Gallery.

name: Pokémon HGSS: Sevii Islands
description: Pokémon HeartGold & SoulSilver: Sevii Islands is a Pokémon Fan Game created by PurpleZaffre using RPG Maker XP and Pokémon Essentials v16.2.

name: F1st Strike
description: F1st Strike is a turn-based game that combines elements of fighting games combos.

name: The Dog
description: This is a short, atmospheric psychological horror where you play as a middle-aged man dealing with probably the most life-changing day in his life. You can briefly do routine family man tasks and live through the story.

name: Lola's Lutong Bahay
description: Lola's Lutong Bahay is an immersive Filipino cooking simulation game where players step into the shoes of Dalisay, a budding chef learning traditional recipes from her beloved grandmother, Lola Felicia. Explore vibrant kitchen settings, master authentic Filipino cooking techniques, and embark on a flavorful journey to recreate iconic dishes. hone your culinary skills and celebrate the rich cultural heritage of Filipino cuisine in this heartwarming game.

name: Open Fire
description: Open Fire is a game boy style arcade game heavily inspired by old game boy games. The game puts together deck building, card collections, and a fun real time battle system. Explore and fight four different sectors, free the island, and collect all the cards! Then do it all again as your collection grows stronger.

name: P.W. Project Witch
description: The protagonist is a 4th grader with troubles socializing with his peers. However his life will change when he receives a package from the "House of Dolls"... a girl his age from a world of magic that's doing a homestay with him! The protagonist will help her grow and progress her powers.

name: Pokemon: The Hodgepodge Platoon
description: Hodgepodge Platoon is a Pokemon Emerald ROM Hack featuring 80+ usable Fakemon in a facility very similar to the Battle Factory. You'll be faced with brand new moves, abilities, stat spreads, and more, spanning all 9 generations of Pokemon. All of the playable Fakemon are lovingly designed and sprited by over 20 different artists. Hop on in and try to get the biggest streak, and fill out the Pokedex along the way!

name: Jet Scalawag: The King of Shooters
description: Fight the mother of all space battles in an epic space combat shooter to end all space combat shooters! Jet Scalawag faces down the evil alien armada through time and space on worlds and expanses never before seen!

name: Repeat After Death
description: The task is simple, defeat enemies using various Characters. But, your past move will consume you the more you continue down the path. Discover the dungeon mysteries while engaging with the other dungeon dwellers

name: Rootmare
description: Step into a world where the pursuit of beauty leads to unimaginable horror. As Nate, face off against mutated monstrosities and navigate a labyrinth of danger with limited resources. Expose the truth behind COSMIC’s experiments, while not succumbing to the nightmare within.

name: Skirmish
description: Fight in online battles for one of two teams or play with bots.

name: Mini Tank Mayhem
description: Collect the rare cards, Build your combo, and destroy the invading alien in this deckbuilder tower defense game. Welcome to Mini Tank Mayhem, a game about cute tanks doing CHAD things.

name: Ganyang Setan Alas: The Game
description: Ganyang Setan Alas! The Game is a single-player shooter set in a haunted Indonesian forest, where four students, armed with a range of weapons, must survive relentless zombie attacks and escape a cursed fate.

name: Thousands Layered Blade: Reforged
description: Thousands Layered Blade: Reforged is an action-packed action RPG game that immerses players in a stunning 3D world inspired by traditional sumi-e art, now enhanced with realistic brush stroke simulations.

name: Jiwa: The Damned Soul
description: A first-person adventure set in an abandoned Indonesian hospital, where two content creators are in dire need of going viral. Explore alternatively as Sekar and Laras to discover and reveal all of the secrets you saw to the world.

name: Zoomageddon
description: Play as Oyen, an orange cat, in a post-apocalyptic world where you collect Zodiac Beasts abilities and challenge the Rat King. Zoomageddon blends bullet-heaven, dungeon roguelike, and base-building mechanics. Uncover story-rich inspired by Chinese Zodiac, unlock building, and discover quirky power!

name: Village Meow
description: Play as Kiti who was a city cat that moved into Village Meow after Kiti’s owner died. Now Kiti is in debt by the local corrupted Mayor, Bos Oyen, after being tricked. Kiti has a choice to either pay off his debts or unite with other villagers to drive out Bos Oyen.

name: The Gambit Lost to Time
description: Become a time-travelling advisor seeking to shape this world towards her ideal future. Choose between one of four kingdoms to support, with the realization that today's friend is an enemy in another timeline. Bring out your best Gambits and lead your troops to victory!

name: Garden of Wandering Souls
description: Garden of Wandering Souls is a Tower Defense game with a roguelite twist, featuring two unique mechanics: path building and tower attack range patterns that resemble puzzles, with narrative and visuals inspired by Indonesia’s Borobudur Temple, the world's largest Buddhist temple.

name: White Room: Mind’s Prison
description: White Room: Mind's Prison is a psychological horror game. You're not allowed to make any sound. Entities will make you scream. Stay quiet! The day counter will increase as you survive! Survive as long as possible.

name: Garuda Emblem
description:
Garuda Emblem is a beat ‘em up game with a taste of RPG content, where you can roam freely in the game’s beautifully hand-drawn world, get immersed in the story, and be the good journalist you are.

Play as Garuda Emblem members, a journalistic student activity unit that uncovers the truth behind the shady part of UNION. As the story unfolds, you’ll encounter various figures that’ll help you along in the journey. You can also upgrade your characters with different skills and abilities using your accumulated experience by beating your enemies to pulp!

Got bored of the main story? Refresh yourself with various side quests and mini games you can discover around the game’s world! Who knows, there might be secrets lying right in front of you all along!

name: Scribblemania
description:
Dive into a chaotic and surreal adventure where your artistic imagination is your greatest weapon! When your late-night spaceship sketch tears open reality, you and your best friend are thrust into an alien world teeming with bizarre creatures, quirky puzzles, and hilarious encounters.

Use your magical doodle device to draw shapes that come to life — smashing obstacles, fighting foes, and solving mind-bending challenges. Will your artistic genius save the day or destroy it? Grab your stylus and sketch your way to survival!

name: Blackblade Revenant
description: Blackblade Revenant is a Sekiro-like action RPG with parry-focused combat set during the fall of an ancient dynasty. Rise from the dead as Revenants and return to the mortal realm with one mission: Kill the King who cheated death.

name: Comme Tu Veux
description: Comme Tu Veux is a visual novel set in 1966 Saigon, focused on two 14-year-old school girls, Hồng and Như Ý, whose friendship falls apart. They meet again at an antiques market where Như Ý outbuys Hồng for a vase. Như Ý disappears, and Hồng's brother is found murdered.

name: Kyrie and Terra
description: Explore Grand Terra's fantasy world through a Japanese RPG. Recruit Celestia, customize them, and gather skill cards and equipment to build your unique party. Save the world in this epic tale of money's power.

name: Ticking Tea Time
description:
A catastrophic bomb is rumored to have been planted by a notorious spy from the West. According to an inside source, the spy fled the scene aboard first-class cabin of Hesperia Express. As Eastside's top detective, you must go undercover as a train waiter to solve this mystery. Serve afternoon tea to investigate suspect passengers, all while a bomb ticks down and a national catastrophe looms.

Can you make the spy spill the tea?Serve up your investigation in Ticking Tea Time!

name: Garland Boy
description: GARLAND FOR SALE! A game about a boy who earn his living by selling flower garlands to cars waiting in a traffic light at the intersection. Save enough money and follow his big dream. When the traffic light turns red, your job begins!
